ValidationRule.description: This rule requires that contract information be entered when a loan type is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR ( ISPICKVAL( Loan_Type__c , "Fixed Daily [ACH Loan]"), ISPICKVAL( Loan_Type__c , "Holdback [MCA]"), ISPICKVAL( Loan_Type__c , "Incremental"), ISPICKVAL( Loan_Type__c , "Other")),
OR( ISBLANK(PSF_Fee__c), AND( ISBLANK(Origination_Fee_Lender__c), ISBLANK(Origination_Fee__c)) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter a PSF Fee and an Origination Fee % or Origination Fee $.
